fields.title: Bookstore Certificate
fields.short_description: $25 UH Bookstore Gift Certificate for the individual with the highest number of points at the end of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Books, notebooks, magazines, art supplies, computers... you name it, the UH Bookstore's got it. With this gift certificate you'll be able to pick something up that you need (or maybe just want!).

This $25 gift certificate goes to the individual across all four towers with the highest point total at the end of Round 1.

fields.title: Bubbies Certificate
fields.short_description: $5 Bubbies Gift Certificate for the individual who earns the most points in each lounge during the week of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
This gift certificate will score you one free ice cream cone from Bubbie's Ice Cream, just a short walk from the residence halls and one of the best ice cream parlors in Hawaii. 

To win this $5 gift certificate, you must earn more points than any other person in your lounge during the week of Round 1.

fields.title: Ice Cream Party
fields.short_description: Mochi Ice Cream Party by Bubbies for lounge that consumes the least amount of energy usage during the week of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Imagine a harmonious combination of creamy gourmet ice cream wrapped in a sweetened rice confection, all resulting in a delectable bite-sized, one and a quarter ounce ball of happiness. As the lounge with the lowest energy usage for this round, you'll snack out on a selection of Bubbies Mochi Ice Cream balls.

To win this prize, your lounge must consume less energy than any other lounge across all four towers during the week of Round 1.

fields.title: Cupcake Extravaganza
fields.short_description: Cupcakes by Hokulani Bakery for the lounge that earns the most points during the week of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Many people believe Hokulani bakes Honolulu's best selection of cupcakes: carrot cake, coconut, snicker doodle, lilikoi, red velvet guava, vanilla, even lychee (when in season)! 

To win this cupcake party, your lounge members must earn more points than any other lounge across all four towers during the week of Round 1.

fields.title: Milano Freezer Card
fields.short_description: $5 Milano Freezer Gift Card for the individual who earns the most points in each lounge during the week of Round 2.
fields.long_description:
Milano Freezer in Manoa Marketplace specializes in high quality gelato, yogurt, and smoothies with all the freshest ingredients. Everything is made in the store daily and there is a wide variety of flavors.

To win this $5 gift certificate, you must earn more points than any other person in your lounge during the week of Round 2. Note that the points you earn during the week of Round 1 do not count toward this prize!

fields.title: Sodexo Flash Cash
fields.short_description: $25 Sodexo Flash Cash for the individual with the highest number of points at the end of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
You've got plenty on your mind: classes, sports, clubs, community service, etc., so Sodexo's goal is to make sure that you won't have to worry about finding something great to eat when you want it. 

To win this $25 gift certificate, you must earn more points than any other individual across all four towers during the week of Round 2.  Note that the points you earn during Round 1 do not count toward this prize.

fields.title: Point Popalooza
fields.short_description: Ono Pop party for lounge with highest number of points earned during the week of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Ono Pops.  The epitome of popsicle evolution.  

To win this Ono Pop party, the members of your lounge must earn more points than any other lounge across all four towers during the week of Round 2.  Note: the points your lounge members earn during Round 1 do not count toward this prize!

fields.title: Malasada Madness
fields.short_description: Malasadas for the lounge with the lowest energy consumption during the week of Round 2.
fields.long_description:
Malasadas are Hawaii's favorite doughnut, and Leonard's Bakery has been perfecting the malasada since 1952.

To win this malasada party, your lounge members must consume less energy than any other lounge across all four towers during the week of Round 2.  Your lounge's energy consumption during Round 1 does not matter for the purpose of this prize!

fields.title: iPad
fields.short_description: iPad 2 for the individual with the greatest number of points across all four towers at the end of the Quest for the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
Thin, light design. Fast A5 chip. FaceTime video calling. 10-hour battery. It's not a tablet, it's iPad 2

To win this iPad, you must earn more points than any other individual in all four towers during the three weeks of the Quest for the Kukui Cup.

fields.title: Bookstore Certificate
fields.short_description: $10 Bookstore Gift Certificate for the individual with the most points on each lounge at the end of the Quest for the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
Books, notebooks, magazines, art supplies, computers... you name it, the UH Bookstore's got it. With this gift certificate you'll be able to pick something up that you need (or maybe just want!).

To win this $10 gift certificate, you must earn more points than any other person in your lounge over the three weeks of the Quest for the Kukui Cup.

fields.title: Energy Pizza Party
fields.short_description: Pizza party for the lounge with the lowest energy consumption over the entire Quest for the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
You did it!  As the lounge that used the least energy out of all four towers, you'll be grinding on a selection of pizzas from one of Hawaii's best pizza parlors. 

To win this pizza party, your lounge must consume less energy than any other lounge across all four towers over the entire three weeks of the competition.

fields.title: Point Pizza Party
fields.short_description: Pizza party for the lounge whose members earned the greatest number of points over the entire Quest for the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
You did it!  As the lounge that earned the most points out of all four towers, you'll be grinding on a selection of pizzas from one of Hawaii's best pizza parlors. 

To win this pizza party, your lounge must earn more points than any other lounge across all four towers over the entire three weeks of the competition.

fields.description: Bid on this to rock your very own Jack Johnson t-shirt from his To The Sea Tour.  Size: M

fields.description: "If everyone played the ukulele, the world would be a better place."  That's Jake Shimabukuro's motto, and you can help make it a reality with this Kala ukulele signed "Lights Off. Game On." by the virtuoso himself!
fields.title: Ukulele

fields.description: You'll be the envy of your friends when you cruise campus on this custom Endless Summer 39" Bomber skateboard with a custom Kukui Cup logo.  It features a gray sand friction surface, a gloss finish bottom, with laminated wood substrate, polyurethane wheels, and performance bearings.
fields.title: Skateboard

fields.description: Ever need to throw a few things on your back for that quick trip to the beach?  HIC has got you covered (well, it's got your back covered, at least) with this drawstring backpack.
fields.title: Backpack

fields.description: Fresh. Healthy. Local.  Aloha Salads strives to serve the highest quality food at affordable prices.  And you'll be able to sample their culinary creations with this $10 gift card.   Locations in Kailua, Kapolei, and Kahala.
fields.title: Aloha Salads

fields.description: Papa Luck's is located on campus, in front of Miller Hall. They're known for their organic brewed coffee drinks but also offer great grinds like bagels, breads, ciabatta sandwiches, and quiche.  But don't take our word for it, find out for yourself with this $8 gift certificate.
fields.title: Papa Luck's

fields.description: The Tea Farm cafe is just a short walk away in Puck's Alley.  It provides tea and a range of delicious snacks. You'll get a packet of 5 gift certificates, each worth one cup of tea, so you can invite your friends along!

fields.description: Want to add some Hawaiian artistry to your room's walls? Check out this print of a honu (sea turtle) petroglyph originally made on a'a'niu (coconut fiber). The print is 11 by 14 inches, and was made and donated by artist Pearl Pualani Ling.
fields.title: Honu Print

fields.description: Want to add some Hawaiian artistry to your room's walls? Check out this print of navigation petroglyphs originally made on a'a'niu (coconut fiber). The print is 11 by 14 inches, and was made and donated by artist Pearl Pualani Ling.
fields.title: Navigation Print
